data.name: Discord -Act- (WEB)
data.description:
A Custom .CSS Discord Theme made for BandagedBD (Bandaged BetterDiscord), now ported to the web version of Discord. 

Added 1.8.5 + fixed discolouration

Some features are missing such as the custom home icon as the web version is different to the app version. Also, the font used in the APP Version is Ronin, which cannot be used on stylish. If there is a way to bypass or change these things, DM me on Discord @tomato#5185, and I'll do it. 

Get the APP Version here: https://actarr.github.io/Act/

data.name: Hacker News Black Green
RimWorld Wiki Dark Theme
YouTube Music UX Improvement
data.description:
This stylesheet makes some needed minor changes to make YouTube Music's control-bar feel more responsive and easier to use.
Improves the UX of YouTube Music's controls, adding minor important interaction elements that are by default omitted, and improving the feel and usability of the playback controls.

Images & video here: https://imgur.com/a/F4V74or
